testsuite.name: CoffeeMachineTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Write how many cups of coffee you will need: > 25 For 25 of coffee you will need: 5000 ml of water 1250 ml of milk 375 g of coffee beans ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Write how many cups of coffee you will need: > 125 For 125 of coffee you will need: 25000 ml of water 6250 ml of milk 1875 g of coffee beans ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Write how many cups of coffee you will need: > 1 For 1 of coffee you will need: 200 ml of water 50 ml of milk 15 g of coffee beans ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m Write how many cups of coffee you will need: > 123 For 123 of coffee you will need: 24600 ml of water 6150 ml of milk 1845 g of coffee beans
